info.title: Almighty Devcamper
info.description:
# Introduction
Backend API for the Almighty Devcamp application to manage bootcamps, courses, reviews and users

get.description: Fetch all bootcamps from database. Includes pagination, filtering and so on.

post.description: Add new bootcamp to database. Must be authenticated and must be a publisher or admin.

requestBody.description: Request body for create a new Bootcamp.

get.description: Fetch all courses from database. Includes pagination, filtering and so on.

post.description: Add new course to database. Must be authenticated and must be a publisher or admin.

requestBody.description: Request body for create a new Course.

get.description: Fetch all courses from database by bootcamp id.

requestBody.description: Request body for update a Bootcamp.
Request body for update a Bootcamp photo.

get.description: Fetch all bootcamps within a radius. Includes pagination, filtering and so on.

requestBody.description: Request body for update a Course.

get.description: Fetch all reviews from database. Includes pagination, filtering and so on.

post.description: Add new review to database for specific bootcamp. Must be authenticated and must be a user or admin.

requestBody.description: Request body for create a new Review.

get.description: Fetch all reviews from database by bootcamp id.

requestBody.description: Request body for update a Review.

post.description: Add new user to database. Must be authenticated and must be an admin.

requestBody.description: Request body for create a new User.

get.description: Fetch all users from database. Includes pagination, filtering and so on.

requestBody.description: Request body for update a User.

post.description: Add user to database with encrypted password.
Login a user verifying his email and password.

get.description: Logout a user to clear token from cookie.
Get current user in the session.

put.description: Update logged in user name and email.

Course.description: Model to create a new Course.

BootcampsResponse.description: Response model to fetch all Bootcamps.

CoursesResponse.description: Response model to fetch all Courses.

Bootcamp.description: Model to create a new Bootcamp.

BootcampResponse.description: Response model to create new Bootcamp.

CourseResponse.description: Response model to create new Course.

ReviewResponse.description: Response model to create new Review.

ReviewsResponse.description: Response model to fetch all Reviews.

Review.description: Model to create a new Review.

UserResponse.description: Response model to create new User.

token.name: token
token.description: Send a valid JWT in the cookies.

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Sort by specific fields from bootcamp.

page.name: page
page.description: Add number of page for pagination the results.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Add limit of elements for the results.
